mapper.select: select h.* from collection co,category c,hotel h where co.category_id = c.id and c.type = "酒店" and co.user_id = #{uid} and h.id = c.product_id limit #{current} , #{size}

select h.* from collection co,category c,hotel h where co.category_id = c.id and c.type = "酒店" and co.user_id = #{uid} and to_days(co.time)=to_days(#{time}) and h.id = c.product_id limit #{current} , #{size}
